Caption: Mrs. Ujjal Singh presents an award to an officer (yet to be identified)
Description: According to the 1967 edition of Campastimes: “Sardarini Ujjal Singh distribute the year’s prizes for general proficiency in the various years and branches. The prize winners were given a big hand as they went up to receive their prizes.” Prof. S. Sampath, Dr. P. C. Varghese and Thomas Victor (General Secretary) are also visible.
